#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
int N;

struct point{
    int x,y;
}p[50];

double area(){
    double area=0;
    int j = N-1;
    for (int i=0;i<N;i++){
        area += (p[i].x + p[j].x) * (p[j].y - p[i].y);
        j=i;
    }
   // cout << a << " " << b << endl;
    return abs(area/2.0);
}

int main()
{
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    while (T--){
        cin >> N;
        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)
        {
            cin >> p[i].x;
        }
        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)
        {
            cin >> p[i].y;
        }
         cout << fixed << setprecision(1) << area() << endl;
    }
}
